name: STUPID GAME
description:
Made in 2 hours using HTML
Must be played by 2 people.

So with LD34 coming up I wanted to practice and get ready for the madness that is coming. This is going to be my first ever LD.

**UPDATES**
-Fixed major collision bug
-Reduced firing speed
-Increased bullet speed.
-Slight optimization
-Slowed down Midblock (was causing collision issues)
-Fixed top collision

Follow me!
https://twitter.com/FlorinGusa
http://wild11.newgrounds.com/follow

P.S: Leave a review! Even if I don't respond I surely read them!
